17  
18  package org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.exception.core.external.sql.type.kernel;
19  
20  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.exception.core.external.sql.sqlstate.XOpenSQLState;
21  import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
22  
23  import java.sql.SQLException;
24  
25  import static org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers.is;
26  import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
27  import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertNull;
28  
29  class KernelSQLExceptionTest {
30      
31      @Test
32      void assertToSQLException() {
33          SQLException actual = new KernelSQLException(XOpenSQLState.GENERAL_ERROR, 1, 1, "reason") {
34          }.toSQLException();
35          assertThat(actual.getSQLState(), is(XOpenSQLState.GENERAL_ERROR.getValue()));
36          assertThat(actual.getErrorCode(), is(11001));
37          assertThat(actual.getMessage(), is("reason"));
38          assertNull(actual.getCause());
39      }
40      
41      @Test
42      void assertToSQLExceptionWithCause() {
43          Exception cause = new RuntimeException("test");
44          SQLException actual = new KernelSQLException(XOpenSQLState.GENERAL_ERROR, 1, 1, cause, "reason") {
45          }.toSQLException();
46          assertThat(actual.getSQLState(), is(XOpenSQLState.GENERAL_ERROR.getValue()));
47          assertThat(actual.getErrorCode(), is(11001));
48          assertThat(actual.getMessage(), is("reason" + System.lineSeparator() + "More details: java.lang.RuntimeException: test"));
49          assertThat(actual.getCause(), is(cause));
50      }
51  }
